item.title: SENIOR PYTHON BACK-END DEVELOPER
item.summary:
FELFEL’s 13 engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how thousands of users consume food at offices. Our product needs to handle information at massive scale and make sure over 100’000 people get their meal of choice at any time of the day.
Your impact will have no limit: together with your peers on the tech team, you will build the ground for our growth in the coming years and make sure our customers have an awesome experience with FELFEL.
item.content: <description><h2><strong>THE FELFEL TECHNOLOGY TEAM &amp; YOUR IMPACT:</strong></h2><p>FELFEL’s 13 engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how thousands of users consume food at offices. Our product needs to handle information at massive scale and make sure over 100’000 people get their meal of choice at any time of the day.</p><p>Your impact will have no limit: together with your peers on the tech team, you will build the ground for our growth in the coming years and make sure our customers have an awesome experience with FELFEL. </p><h2> </h2><h2><strong>OUR TECH STACK:</strong></h2><p>Our main backends are written in C# / .NET and Python 3, using the Django library (for APIs and ORM).<br/>For machine learning and optimization we rely on pandas, scikit-learn and tensorflow.<br/>Our fridges are running an Android application to serve the POS user interface. It interfaces with various peripherals via USB and GPIO (temperature sensor, NFC reader, door lock).<br/>We run on Azure/Docker/Kubernetes and configure and auto-deploy our applications with helm and flux. Data is stored in Postgres and SQL Server and we use various queuing/messaging tools (Pusher, RabbitMQ, Kafka). For analytics and BI, we rely on Tableau and use <a href="http://logz.io/">logz.io</a>’s ELK stack to analyze our application logs and telemetry.</p><p> </p><div><div><div><h2><strong>YOUR ROLE:</strong></h2><ul><li><strong>Back-end development for our core technology</strong>, which allows us to manage the inventory of all our fridges in real-time, manage our cooled supply chain, and sell products to our end-customers</li><li><strong>Keeping the architecture of our stack clean</strong> <strong>and the data structured – </strong>you will also shape and eventually own the architecture of services and databases</li><li><strong>Developing tools for our internal teams </strong>(sales, support, operations, finance) to increase efficiency in business, and work closely with our UI-focused team members to integrate their front-ends with our backend services</li><li><strong>Continuously improve and maintain systems </strong>to ensure we have high performance, up-time, and strong security in place</li></ul> <br/><h2> </h2></div></div></div><h2><strong>WHAT WE OFFER:</strong></h2><ul><li><strong>Lots of good (like really good ;)) food</strong>: Just steps away from your desk – we make all food dreams come true...</li><li><strong>Barista</strong>: Our office barista makes fresh coffee &amp; tea for the whole team every day: be it Cappuccino, Americano, Espresso, Chai or Matcha – whatever you prefer the most!</li><li><strong>Holidays:</strong> Enjoy 5 weeks of holidays every year</li><li><strong>Birthday retreat:</strong> Take a half day off work to enjoy your birthday</li><li><strong>Transport</strong>: We encourage employees to use public transport by financing the half-fare card</li><li><strong>Family:</strong> FELFEL is a family business with strong values. We support parenting by giving 3 weeks of holidays for new dads, 16 weeks for new mums, and paying for up to two days per week of child care</li><li><strong>People:</strong> A great international &amp; diverse team (20 different nationalities!). We are selective – and only hire the best chess players, cooks or video gamers ;)</li><li><strong>Location:</strong> We are located in the heart of Zurich - on the top floor in a bright, open office with significant focus space too</li><li><strong>Entertainment:</strong> Even in Corona times we have a lot of fun together as a team and as colleagues. We have virtual wine tastings and an absolutely proven security concept, which allows us to eat together in the office. When Corona is over, we "offer" various events: team aperos, sledding trips, breakfast events, joint cooking events and the well-known FELFEL Summer-outings.</li><li><strong>Awesome customers</strong>: We have great, open customers that love to provide feedback and engage with us.</li><li><strong>Transfer help</strong>: Should you move from a different country to support us, we are happy to support you.</li></ul><h2> </h2><h2><strong>HOW YOU APPLY:</strong></h2><p>Please apply directly via <a href="https://careers.felfel.ch/">careers.felfel.ch</a> by clicking on the Button "Apply for this position". </p><p>We can only consider complete applications submitted via the application form. We promise to get back to you within 72 hours!</p><p>What do we need?</p><ul><li>CV</li><li>a short cover letter explaining why you are the right fit for this role</li></ul><h2> </h2><h2>WHO WE ARE, THE FELFEL COMPANY:</h2><p>FELFEL revolutionizes how people eat at work with smart technology. Our intelligent fridge makes it possible - good food all day long for employees at work, created by the best local chefs.</p><p>Over 100'000 employees at more than 500 companies in Switzerland already benefit from a FELFEL fridge at work. FELFEL is a family-owned company and supports small, local producers in Switzerland. Sustainability is a core company value. The company has won several prestigious awards, among others the Swiss Economic Forum Award in 2017. The company was founded in 2013 and counts over 100 employees today. Friendship, respect, 'eating good food together' are key elements of our company culture. You can find more insights on the company and the team on <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/felfel/">LinkedIn</a>, <a href="https://www.facebook.com/felfelgoodfoodatwork/">Facebook</a>, <a href="https://www.instagram.com/felfel/">Instagram</a> and of course our <a href="http://www.felfel.ch/">website</a>.</p></description>
item.name: FELFEL - Good food at work

item.title: Dutch Customer Support for International Tech Brand
item.summary: Our IT American brand is widely recognized as the “world’s best search engine”, because it is fast, accurate and easy to use. It is also a manufacturer of smart home products including thermostats, smoke detectors, and security systems including smart doorbells and smart locks.
item.content: <description><p><strong>About Webhelp</strong></p><p><strong>Webhelp</strong> is a French multinational BPO company that is making business more human for the world’s most exciting brands. By <strong>choosing Webhelp</strong> you will be part of a family of over 95,000 game-changers from more than 190 locations in 51 countries.</p><p>Join us at <strong>Webhelp Portugal</strong> and you will have the opportunity to be part of a multicultural team, a fast-paced environment, and a diverse pool of engaging projects with some of the best B2C and B2B brands worldwide.</p><p> </p><p><strong>About the job role: </strong></p><p>Our IT American brand is widely recognized as the “world’s best search engine”, because it is fast, accurate and easy to use. It is also a manufacturer of smart home products including thermostats, smoke detectors, and security systems including smart doorbells and smart locks.</p><p><strong>As a</strong><strong> Customer Advisor</strong><strong>,</strong><strong> you will:</strong></p><ul><li>Respond to inbound customer requests, document relevant case information</li><li>Ensure excellent customer satisfaction</li><li>Ability to assist users with Pre-Sales, General Inquiries, and technical support issues via phone/email/chat/social/social messaging channels (as assigned)</li><li>Respond appropriately to customer escalations and escalate issues and customers to higher tiers of support as defined and documented</li><li>Collaborate with other technicians to resolve or properly close help tickets</li><li>Manage an individual ticket queue</li><li>Responsible to follow the direction of management and provide feedback</li></ul><p> </p><p><strong>We are looking for:</strong></p><ul><li>Native or Proficient <strong>Dutch (C2)</strong></li><li>Fluency in<strong> English (B2)</strong></li><li>Possess excellent writing and verbal communication skills to simplify technical language for non-technical users</li><li>Demonstrate patience when communicating and solving issues</li><li>Treat all data and personal information with the utmost confidentiality</li><li>Keep up with the latest IT and tech-related trends</li><li>Proactive, self-motivated, and a great team player</li></ul><p> </p><p><strong>We offer you:</strong></p><ul><li>Competitive wages (14 monthly payments per year)</li><li>Meal allowance paid in voucher card (net)</li><li>Monthly Performance Bonus</li><li>Health insurance with a dental plan (after 6 months contract)</li><li>Opportunities for career progression and possibilities for an international career through the Webhelp International Mobility Program</li><li><strong>Relocation package - shared accommodation and flight reimbursement if you come from abroad</strong></li></ul><p> </p><p><strong>Life at our company: </strong></p><ul><li>Work with a diverse environment with people from over 58 nationalities</li><li>Benefit from our modern amenities, many discounts in local businesses, company parties and events and much more!</li><li>We promote inter-company mobility to work at any of our sites around the world</li><li>New and modern offices in <strong>Lisbon, Oriente, Portugal.</strong></li></ul><p> </p><p>All submissions will be treated confidentially under the General Data Protection Regulation.</p><p><strong>Webhelp Portugal</strong> is an equal opportunity employer.</p><p>Webhelp considers diversity as a fundamental resource and it offers everyone access to employment opportunities, regardless of their gender, age, religion, ethnicity, or any other classification protected by applicable national laws.</p></description>
item.name: Webhelp Portugal

Join us at Webhelp Portugal and you will have the opportunity to be part of a multicultural team, a fast-paced environment, and a diverse pool of engaging projects with some of the best B2C and B2B brands worldwide.

item.title: Brand Standards Adviser
item.summary: You will join a team of brand experts who are activist ambassadors for Brand Standards excellence, helping customers, agencies and teams around the world achieve creative excellence whilst remaining fabulously on-brand.
item.content: <description><p>You will join a team of brand experts who are activist ambassadors for Brand Standards excellence, helping customers, agencies and teams around the world achieve creative excellence whilst remaining fabulously on-brand.</p><p>The world is changing fast and Shell is changing too – not only to keep up with the external pace, but also to anticipate and shape a different future. The new integrated Corporate Relations function will deliver value by supporting our strategy and sectoral approach and improving policy and advocacy outcomes. We will bring the outside in and secure and drive Shell’s reputation and values. Drawing on a strong base of professional excellence, we aspire to be best-in-class at achieving integrated outcomes through effective engagement and communication with external and internal stakeholders.</p><p> </p><p><strong>Where you fit in:</strong></p><p>The Shell brand is the company’s most valuable asset. The busy AskBrand team plays a key role to build and protect the Shell Brand, helping manage and advise on effective, coherent and compliant application of Shell Brand Standards.</p><p>The AskBrand team manages brand-related projects and responds annually to thousands of brand-related questions and approvals on brand applications, including communications; merchandise; packaging; naming and sub-brands; events; vehicles, and 3rd party use of the Shell brand. The AskBrand team helps approve assets and resolve customer questions by either directly helping the customer or connecting with the right colleagues to effectively resolve the question. </p><p>Compliant and consistent delivery of Shell Group Brand Standards and associated Brand Policies, ultimately to support the delivery of the ‘One Brand’ strategy, is critical to build, protect and strengthen the Shell Brand. </p><p> </p><p><strong>What’s the role?</strong></p><p>We’re looking for a brand enthusiast who can be an ambassador for creative, compliant Brand Standards excellence, and help customers, agencies and teams locally and around the world with their diverse brand-related questions, projects and Brand Identity approvals. They will deliver efficient, effective Brand IdentityPolicy approvals and advice through the AskBrand service (50,000+ approvals and questions per year) and manage/input into related brand and design projects.</p><ul><li>Give accurate, quality brand advice based on Brand Standards, and review and approve branded assets and communications;</li><li>In the Shell office, be the to go-to person as brand identity special matter expert for local stakeholders, agencies, LOBs;</li><li>Spend a large amount of your time on excellent proactive stakeholder relationship development, outreach and other affinity activities, e.g. brand training of (local) Shell employees and agencies;</li><li>Share detailed outreach/affinity outcome each month with Head of Brand Standards and Assurance;</li><li>Provide a clear and customer-centric service to stakeholders and agencies over the AskBrand e-tool, email, phone, Instant messaging, F2F and in meetings;</li><li>Meet the 24-hour customer response targets of 95% of all queries;</li><li>Make recommendations for continuous improvement of processes, tools and ways of working;</li><li>Provide data analysis, sharing trends, insights and recommendations with the wider Brand Standards team, and with business stakeholders through outreach, presentations and meetings;</li><li>Excellent stakeholder management and network building capabilities with other parts of the business, in order to connect AskBrand customers with the right mix of people to resolve brand questions – forging connections across all LOBs, functions, legal, ER, and beyond;</li><li>Work alongside trademark team;</li><li>Support on brand identity projects across all brand touchpoints and disciplines (packaging, events, Sound of Shell, joint ventures, etc.);</li><li>Develop knowledge of, and relationships with, local creative agencies and other suppliers of brand services across all major brand expression areas: packaging, colour, communications, experiential, digital, research, etc.</li></ul><p> </p><p><strong>What we need from you</strong></p><ul><li>The successful candidate will be collaborative, and have proven experience in brand, design, marketing, or communications. </li><li>Excellent written and spoken English and Mandarin are essential.</li><li>Have, or develop, excellent working knowledge of brand principles generally, the Shell Brand, the One Brand Principle, Shell Brand Management system.</li><li>Learner Mindset – role model curiosity and reflection; encourage people to learn from mistakes and successes.</li><li>Maximize performance – integrate and collaborate across boundaries to maximize commercial value for Shell as a whole.</li><li>Flexibility to manage delivery of a diverse and demanding workload.</li><li>Customer-centricity is critical;</li><li>Ability to develop strong, trusted relationships with colleagues across Shell in both business and country roles is crucial for the success of this role;</li><li>Proven inquisitive, analytical, strong logic and problem-solving mindset; quick learner and active self-starter.</li><li>High attention to detail and be happy to provide challenge where they identify opportunities for improvement/optimization.</li></ul><p>We are keen to support flexible working arrangements, subject to local regulations and legislative frameworks. If this is of interest to you, please describe in your application the type of flexible working arrangements for which you would like to be considered.</p></description>
item.name: Shell Energy Limited
item.description: The world is changing fast and Shell is changing too – not only to keep up with the external pace, but also to anticipate and shape a different future. The new integrated Corporate Relations function will deliver value by supporting our strategy and sectoral approach and improving policy and advocacy outcomes. We will bring the outside in and secure and drive Shell’s reputation and values. Drawing on a strong base of professional excellence, we aspire to be best-in-class at achieving integrated outcomes through effective engagement and communication with external and internal stakeholders.

item.description: The Group of the European People's Party (EPP Group) is the largest political group in the European Parliament. It brings together centre and centre-right pro-European political forces from the Member States of the EU, coming together to advance the goal of a more competitive and democratic Europe, closer to its citizens, and a social market economy. Choose your preferred tech stack and receive job offers from leading tech companies in the Netherlands!
IT, honeypot, information technology, developer
item.content: <description><p><span style="font-weight:400;">Honeypot supports Software Developers, DevOps Engineers and Engineering Leaders as well as Data Scientists, Data Engineers and Machine Learning Engineers. </span></p><p><span style="font-weight:400;">Companies can search for developers based on skills and specialisations — the qualifications and requirements of each company may differ depending on their tech needs. </span></p><p> </p><p>Creating a profile is quick and easy, it takes less than five minutes to share your skills, experience and work preferences. And after that, your profile will be available to hundreds of companies located in Germany, the Netherlands, Switzerland and Austria.</p><p>You’ll also have access to dedicated career advisors who can offer personalised profile and interview support so you can focus on choosing a great job.</p></description>

item.name: Honeypot GmbH
item.description: Honeypot is a reverse-recruiting developer focused job platform, meaning companies apply to you not the other way around. Your profile will indicate your ideal location, salary and tech stack so companies can send tailored interview invitations. Top developers on the platform usually receive multiple interview invitations meaning they can compare offers side-by-side for a better job search experience.

item.title: Cabin Crew Team
item.summary: As the market conditions are improving and our network is growing, we are now looking to grow our Cabin Crew team, Qatar Airways’ Ambassadors to the world.
item.content: <description><p style="text-align:justify;">Begin your journey with us.</p><p style="text-align:justify;">Join our award-winning Cabin Crew team.</p><p style="text-align:justify;">As the market conditions are improving and our network is growing, we are now looking to grow our Cabin Crew team, Qatar Airways’ Ambassadors to the world.</p><p style="text-align:justify;">We are in search of highly motivated individuals who can deliver our legendary hospitality and world-class service. With industry-leading benefits and unparalleled training programs, you will support the Customer Experience division by creating memorable experiences for our passengers onboard.</p><p style="text-align:justify;"> As you work with Qatar Airways, you can take comfort knowing that you are flying with the only airline in the world that has, together with its state-of-the-art global hub Hamad International Airport, achieved four 5-Star Skytrax ratings – including the prestigious 5-Star Airline Rating, 5-Star Airport Rating, 5-Star COVID-19 Airline Safety Rating and 5-Star COVID-19 Airport Safety Rating.</p><p style="text-align:justify;">We have always been a leader in the industry and have adapted since the beginning of pandemic becoming the biggest global carrier, whilst continuing to redefine our levels of safety, comfort and service throughout our onboard experience.</p><p style="text-align:justify;">Start writing your own story with Qatar Airways, an airline that has never stopped flying and remained resilient throughout the pandemic.</p><p style="text-align:justify;"> </p></description>
item.name: Qatar Airways
item.description: Qatar Airways is proud to be one of the youngest global airlines to serve all six continents, and thanks to our customers’ response to our offerings, we are also the world’s fastest-growing airline. We connect more than 140 destinations on the map every day, with a fleet of the latest-generation aircraft, and an unrivalled level of service from our home and hub, the Five-star airport, Hamad International Airport in Doha, the State of Qatar.

item.title: Senior Java Developer
item.summary: As a Senior Java Developer, you will work at the heart of the design, development, implementation and continuous improvement of applications and the product lifecycle of the Marketing Software that our partner creates.
item.content: <description><p><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">You are a key player in the agile software development team and responsible for designing the prototype application, specifying software architecture and coordinating application development plans with the development team or the client. At our client, you are not a small 'cog in the wheel', but work internally with a team of other highly skilled members, collaborating with colleagues in other regions.</span></p><p><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">You will work in an innovative environment on complex projects in the field of marketing technology for leading international business customers.</span></p><p><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">If there is a problem, you solve it. If there is a better way, you find it. If something hasn't been done before, you do it. If you make a promise, you keep it. You have a broad interest in new technology, (social) media and web technologies. You promote a culture of professionalism, customer service and technical excellence.</span></p><p><strong><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Basic requirements</span></strong></p><ul><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">HBO or Academic background in software engineering (computer science, artificial intelligence, etc)</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Experience with Java web application development (including HTML5, Javascript and CSS)</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Practical experience with working with REST, GraphQL and gRPC.</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Knowledge of Javascript frameworks such as node.js/Typescript/Angular</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Experience (or affinity) with: IntelliJ, Hibernate, Spring, Spring Boot, Tomcat, MongoDB, MySQL, JSON, XML and XSLT</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Knowledge of SSO/OAuth/OIDC, BPMN and workflow engines (Activiti) is desirable.</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Experience with AWS</span></li></ul><p><strong><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Essential Personal Skills</span></strong></p><ul><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Professional attitude towards our customers and colleagues</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Independent, confident and at ease in a dynamic organisation</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Good sense of humour, innovative and a broad interest in new technology, (social) media and web technologies</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">You work together with other skilled team members on Web Services, APIs and Open Standards.</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Eager to have the opportunity to develop and expand your knowledge.</span></li><li><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl"> In our agile team there is plenty of room to learn and develop your skills. We expect you to foster a culture of professionalism, customer focus and technical excellence. In addition, you will provide ongoing personal professional development and support to the development team so that they can develop their specialist knowledge. Finally, you will ensure that implementation work is carried out in a professional manner, following best practice implementation processes and procedures.</span></li></ul><p><strong><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl">Interested in the Senior Jave Developer position?</span></strong><span lang="nl" xml:lang="nl"><br/> Send us your CV and short motivation and we will contact you as soon as possible.</span></p></description>

item.description: Resourcers is an international Recruitment & Selection agency in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. We are specialised in Software Development, Data Analytics and Consultancy roles.

item.title: Secret Shopper in Munich
item.summary: Luxury brands are looking for your customer feedback to improve their customer experience, in store and online !
item.content: <description><p>“<em>Imagine getting paid to grace the stores of the world's top luxury and premium brands...!</em></p><p><em>Luxury brands are looking for your customer feedback to improve their customer experience, in store and online !</em></p><p><em>If you enjoy shopping and are looking for an occasional hobby and to make some extra money, during lunch break or after work, this may be the opportunity for you.</em></p><p><em>This is the opportunity CXG currently has available for expert male and female shoppers in <strong>Berlin</strong>. Simply visit a boutique (and/or browse the brand's website), share your insights in a survey and get rewarded.</em></p><p><em>To join our community, register through the link below and we will be in touch.</em></p><p><a href="https://www.albatrossonline.com"><em>https://www.albatrossonline.com</em></a></p><p>“<em>Stellen Sie sich vor, Sie werden dafür bezahlt, die Geschäfte der besten Luxus- und Premiummarken der Welt zu schmücken ...!</em></p><p><em>Luxusmarken suchen nach Ihrem Kundenfeedback, um ihr Kundenerlebnis im Geschäft und online zu verbessern!</em></p><p><em>Wenn Sie gerne einkaufen und auf der Suche nach einem gelegentlichen Hobby sind und etwas mehr Geld verdienen möchten, in der Mittagspause oder nach der Arbeit, kann dies die Gelegenheit für Sie sein.</em></p><p><em>Dies ist die Möglichkeit, die CXG derzeit für erfahrene männliche und weibliche Käufer in <strong>Berlin</strong> bietet. Besuchen Sie einfach eine Boutique (und/ oder durchsuchen Sie die Website der Marke), teilen Sie Ihre Erkenntnisse in einer Umfrage und lassen Sie sich belohnen.</em></p><p><em>Um unserer Community beizutreten, registrieren Sie sich über den untenstehenden Link und wir werden uns mit Ihnen in Verbindung setzen.</em></p><p> </p><p> </p><p><a href="https://www.albatrossonline.com"><em>https://www.albatrossonline.com</em></a></p></description>
item.name: CXG
item.description: CXG offers a powerful, holistic platform that enables premium and luxury brands to transform their experiences for meaningful impact. We believe in partnering with our clients at every and any stage of their CX transformation journey, while providing consulting and actionable advice along the way.

item.title: French Customer Support for International Tech Brand
item.summary: Our IT American brand is widely recognized as the “world’s best search engine”, because it is fast, accurate and easy to use. It is also a manufacturer of smart home products including thermostats, smoke detectors, and security systems including smart doorbells and smart locks.
item.content: <description><p><strong>About Webhelp</strong></p><p><strong>Webhelp</strong> is a French multinational BPO company that is making business more human for the world’s most exciting brands. By <strong>choosing Webhelp</strong> you will be part of a family of over 95,000 game-changers from more than 190 locations in 51 countries.</p><p>ave the opportunity to be part of a multicultural team, a fast-paced environment, and a diverse pool of engaging projects with some of the best B2C and B2B brands worldwide.</p><p><strong>As a</strong><strong> Customer Advisor</strong><strong>,</strong><strong> you will:</strong></p><ul><li>Respond to inbound customer requests, document relevant case information</li><li>Ensure excellent customer satisfaction</li><li>Ability to assist users with Pre-Sales, General Inquiries, and technical support issues via phone/email/chat/social/social messaging channels (as assigned)</li><li>Respond appropriately to customer escalations and escalate issues and customers to higher tiers of support as defined and documented</li><li>Collaborate with other technicians to resolve or properly close help tickets</li><li>Manage an individual ticket queue</li><li>Responsible to follow the direction of management and provide feedback</li></ul><p> </p><p><strong>We are lo</strong></p><p> Join us at <strong>Webhelp Portugal</strong> and you will h<strong>oking for:</strong></p><ul><li>Native or Proficient <strong>French (C2)</strong></li><li>Fluency in<strong> English (B2)</strong></li><li>Possess excellent writing and verbal communication skills to simplify technical language for non-technical users</li><li>Demonstrate patience when communicating and solving issues</li><li>Treat all data and personal information with the utmost confidentiality</li><li>Keep up with the latest IT and tech-related trends</li><li>Proactive, self-motivated, and a great team player</li></ul><p> </p><p><strong>We offer you:</strong></p><ul><li>Competitive wages (14 monthly payments per year)</li><li>Meal allowance paid in voucher card (net)</li><li>Monthly Performance Bonus</li><li>Health insurance with a dental plan (after 6 months contract)</li><li>Opportunities for career progression and possibilities for an international career through the Webhelp International Mobility Program</li><li><strong>Relocation package - shared accommodation and flight reimbursement if you come from abroad</strong></li></ul><p> </p><p><strong>Life at our company: </strong></p><ul><li>Work with a diverse environment with people from over 58 nationalities</li><li>Benefit from our modern amenities, many discounts in local businesses, company parties and events and much more!</li><li>We promote inter-company mobility to work at any of our sites around the world</li><li>New and modern offices in <strong>Lisbon, Oriente, Portugal.</strong></li></ul><p> </p><p>All submissions will be treated confidentially under the General Data Protection Regulation.</p><p><strong>Webhelp Portugal</strong> is an equal opportunity employer.</p><p>Webhelp considers diversity as a fundamental resource and it offers everyone access to employment opportunities, regardless of their gender, age, religion, ethnicity, or any other classification protected by applicable national laws.</p></description>

Join us at Webhelp Portugal and you will have the opportunity to be part of a multicultural team, a fast-paced environment, and a diverse pool of engaging projects with some of the best B2C and B2B brands worldwide.

item.title: Inside Sales Representative Nordics
item.summary: Our Inside Sales Team is growing and we are looking for new colleagues to join us. As part of our Inside Sales Team you will work closely with your regional team, partners and customers to accelerate our business growth.
item.content: <description><p dir="ltr">About Eagle Eye Networks:</p><div> </div><p dir="ltr">Eagle Eye Networks was founded in Austin, Texas in 20212. Since then we have changed the Video Surveillance as a Service market globally. As a pioneer in the cloud, our AI applications will drive the industry's next transformation. Our mission is to make businesses more efficient and the world a safer place. With projects around the world we serve our customers in multiple industries from Smart Buildings to Hospitals. Our company is spread over 90 countries and hosted by more than 300 employees with an expected market share of nearly $2.3 billion.</p><p dir="ltr">Eagle Eye Networks strives to stay the number one Cloud Video Surveillance company of the world, and we need your help to do this! We want to hire great people, who are passionate about using their talents to generate success. We are currently looking for colleagues to join our Inside Sales team to help achieve our mission and accelerate as the number one Cloud Video Surveillance company in the world. </p><div> </div><p dir="ltr"><strong>What you will do:</strong></p><p dir="ltr">Our Inside Sales Team is growing and we are looking for new colleagues to join us. As part of our Inside Sales Team you will work closely with your regional team, partners and customers to accelerate our business growth. As the center of the region you are a crucial part of the growth of Eagle Eye Networks. </p><div> </div><p dir="ltr"><strong>Your responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Grow and maintain a direct relationship with all Eagle Eye channel partners in the assigned region;</li><li>Deliver a high service level and act as a coordinator towards the partners in the Nordics.</li><li>Manage new partner certifications; </li><li>Perform product demonstrations of Eagle Eye VMS software;</li><li>Handle orders from partners; </li><li>Support partners with design requests for projects utilizing Eagle Eye Cloud VMS;</li><li>Answer inbound calls/chats from end customers and resellers with inquiries about selling Eagle Eye VMS;</li><li>Develop relationships with potential customers;</li><li>Join trade shows to maintain relationships in the respective territory; </li><li>Requirement to travel from time to time to meet key partners; </li><li>Playing an important role in achieving Eagle Eye Networks goals. </li></ul><div> </div><p dir="ltr"><strong>Who you are: </strong></p><ul><li>An entrepreneur. Entrepreneurial individual with a drive to buildup new business </li><li>Social. Strong relationship building skills </li><li>Curious. Always looking to learn new skills and challenge the status quo </li><li>Energetic. Demonstrate self-confidence, energy, and enthusiasm</li><li>Resilient. You do not take ‘’no’’ in the first instance and will go the extra mile for a ‘’yes’’</li><li>Organized. Present ideas, expectations, and information in a concise, well-organized way</li></ul><div> </div><p dir="ltr">If you see yourself in this profile and want to be part of a fast-growing international company with an exceptional interest in new technologies, we welcome you to apply. Maybe you will become our next Eagle to join the nest! </p><div> </div><p dir="ltr"><strong>Desired requirements:</strong></p><ul><li>Native Swedish speaker, business English </li><li>You are living in Sweden or Denmark </li><li>Minimum of 3 years sales experience</li><li>Successful experience selling as an employee of a major security manufacturer is a plus</li><li>Consultative/solutions sales with 90+ day B2B sales cycles</li><li>Excellent knowledge of google applications (sheets, docs etc.) and CRM System (Zoho, Salesforce, Hubspot) </li></ul></description>
item.name: Eagle Eye Networks
item.description: At Eagle Eye Networks, we’re taking video surveillance technology to the next level. We’re not only advancing surveillance and security, we’re also providing customers with valuable business intelligence to help them improve operations, reduce costs, and ensure their staff members are as efficient and effective as possible. These innovations are changing the face of the video surveillance industry. If you think you are a great fit but your job is not listed, send your resume to careers@een.com

item.title: C++ Software Engineer
item.summary: To complement its growing team, Verity is looking for an experienced and versatile embedded applications software engineer capable of designing and developing high-quality software for Verity's indoor drone systems. In this role, you will develop embedded application software that runs on-board our drones and handles high-bandwidth data streams. This will require a strong focus on performance, reliability, and graceful degradation. In addition, you will design and develop the communication protocols needed by the drones to interact with our applications in the Cloud.
item.content: <description/>
item.name: Verity AG
item.description:
Verity is the global leader in autonomous indoor drone systems and a leading provider of drone failsafe technology. Founded in 2014, Verity's drones have completed more than 250,000 autonomous flights safely above people, in more than 100 facilities in 20 countries worldwide.
In the logistics and warehousing industries, Verity’s solutions automate inventory management, monitoring, and inspection tasks, providing clients such as IKEA and DSV actionable insights into their daily operations. In the live events industries, Verity’s systems create magical moments for audiences around the globe, providing stunning light shows for clients including Cirque du Soleil and Madison Square Garden, and for global tours of major artists including Metallica, Drake, and Céline Dion.
We continuously reach beyond existing limitations to rethink, reimagine, and rework the role of robotics in the world today. Come help us break new boundaries for drone systems and technologies!. The Verity team is made up of people from all walks of life. With over 20 nationalities in a team of around 70 people, we are entrepreneurs, engineers, artists, business professionals, computer scientists, and designers working together as one.
Are you ready for a great adventure? Learn more about who we are, what we do, and how we think at www.verity.ch/careers

item.title: Customer Service Agent - bilingual English and German
item.summary: Bilingual German / English Customer Service Representatives Work from Home in Poland.
item.content: <description><p>Location: Remote, Poland<br/><br/><strong>Bilingual German / English Customer Service Representatives<br/></strong><strong>Work from Home in Poland. <br/><br/></strong>Congratulations! You are just 90 minutes away from a new job in your own home! <br/><br/>After we have reviewed your initial application, you will receive an email link to a multi part online assessment to complete in your own time. Good Luck!<br/><br/><strong>What We Offer You:</strong></p><ul><li>Competitive Salary</li><li>Pension</li><li>Monthly Bonus</li><li>Home office support contribution</li><li>Gym Membership contribution</li><li>Private Health Care Provider</li></ul><p><strong><br/>What You'll Do</strong></p><ul><li>Build a relationship with the customer</li><li>Service customers with post-order issues (returns, replacements, refunds, delivery status, back ordered items, and any issues with fulfillment)</li><li>Provide customer satisfaction working towards efficiency metrics, and issue resolution targets</li><li>Identify areas of improvement and convey trends in customer calls to leadership</li><li>Navigate multiple software applications and technologies simultaneously</li><li>Use conflict management skills and maintain professional composure</li></ul><p><strong><br/>What You'll Need</strong></p><ul><li>Comfortable business level in verbal and written German &amp; English, ideally C1</li><li>Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think analytically</li><li>Excellent communication and relationship building skills</li><li>Passion for helping others</li><li>A successful track record working in a high-volume fast paced environment</li><li>Ability to maintain internet speed of at least 25 Mbps (download) and 5 Mbps (upload) </li><li>A workspace that is free from noise or distraction (Wayfair provides all necessary computer equipment)</li><li>Available to commit to a fixed Monday to Friday 09:30 to 18:30 training schedule for the first 3 weeks</li></ul><p><strong><br/>More Information about us:<br/></strong>At Wayfair, we care about our customers! Our award-winning Customer Service Team balances technology and human empathy to build customer trust and loyalty. From the time the customer orders with Wayfair through delivery to their home, our team works to make it easier than ever to shop for the home.<br/><br/>The Customer Service Team works proactively in a fast-paced environment to monitor customer orders and ensure a seamless delivery to the customer. In the event a customer should contact our support team via phone, email, chat, social media, or in other ways, we empower our Customer Service Team to resolve the issue. We are passionate about our customers and work to delight them on every interaction with Wayfair.<br/><br/><strong>About Wayfair Inc.<br/></strong>Wayfair is one of the world’s largest online destinations for the home. Whether you work in our global headquarters in Boston or Berlin, or in our warehouses or offices throughout the world, we’re reinventing the way people shop for their homes. Through our commitment to industry-leading technology and creative problem-solving, we are confident that Wayfair will be home to the most rewarding work of your career. If you’re looking for rapid growth, constant learning, and dynamic challenges, then you’ll find that amazing career opportunities are knocking.<br/><br/>No matter who you are, Wayfair is a place you can call home. We’re a community of innovators, risk-takers, and trailblazers who celebrate our differences, and know that our unique perspectives make us stronger, smarter, and well-positioned for success. We value and rely on the collective voices of our employees, customers, community, and suppliers to help guide us as we build a better Wayfair – and world – for all. Every voice, every perspective matters. That’s why we’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, ethnicity, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship status, marital status, disability, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or genetic information.</p></description>

Whether you work in our global headquarters in Boston or Berlin, or in our warehouses or offices throughout the world, we’re reinventing the way people shop for their homes. item.title: Backend Engineer (AWS)
item.summary: Verity is seeking an experienced Cloud Backend Engineer to shape and contribute to our efforts in building cloud-based solutions to manage our industrial drone system, extending its functionalities, and preparing for large-scale commercialization. In this role, you will contribute to the continuous design, development, test, and maintenance of our serverless cloud backend. Depending on your profile, the focus could be on the underlying functionality and frameworks needed to connect drones to the cloud, or on the client-facing dashboard while working closely with our solution teams to integrate with the systems of our clients.
item.content: <description><p>Your daily tasks will focus on architectural design and development of our backend code, with emphasis on reliability and scalability. You will ensure that best practices continue to be the standard in our code base and code review process. With your background in realizing scalable production systems, you enrich the team’s expertise and become a key contributor to the development roadmap. Finally, you will contribute to a fun working environment, delivering state-of-the-art drone-based solutions that are already revolutionizing logistic processes for renowned clients.</p><p>The global leader in autonomous indoor drone systems, Verity enables zero-error warehousing for big box retailers, third-party logistics providers, and manufacturers, with our integrated inventory tracking system. Verity counts 3PL giant DSV and IKEA among their current client base. Our live events solutions help create stunning effects for top names in the entertainment industry like Drake, Céline Dion, Metallica, and Cirque du Soleil. We continuously reach beyond existing limitations to rethink, reimagine, and rework the role of robotics in the world today.<br/><br/>Come help us break new boundaries for drone systems and technologies!</p></description>

item.title: Cabin Crew team
item.summary: As the market conditions are improving and our network is growing, we are now looking to grow our Cabin Crew team, Qatar Airways’ Ambassadors to the world.
item.content: <description><p>Begin your journey with us.</p><p>Join our award-winning Cabin Crew team.</p><p>As the market conditions are improving and our network is growing, we are now looking to grow our Cabin Crew team, Qatar Airways’ Ambassadors to the world.</p><p>We are in search of highly motivated individuals who can deliver our legendary hospitality and world-class service. With industry-leading benefits and unparalleled training programs, you will support the Customer Experience division by creating memorable experiences for our passengers onboard.</p><p>As you work with Qatar Airways, you can take comfort knowing that you are flying with the only airline in the world that has, together with its state-of-the-art global hub Hamad International Airport, achieved four 5-Star Skytrax ratings – including the prestigious 5-Star Airline Rating, 5-Star Airport Rating, 5-Star COVID-19 Airline Safety Rating and 5-Star COVID-19 Airport Safety Rating.</p><p>We have always been a leader in the industry and have adapted since the beginning of pandemic becoming the biggest global carrier, whilst continuing to redefine our levels of safety, comfort and service throughout our onboard experience.</p><p>Start writing your own story with Qatar Airways, an airline that has never stopped flying and remained resilient throughout the pandemic.</p><p> </p><p> </p></description>
item.name: Qatar Airways
item.description: Qatar Airways is proud to be one of the youngest global airlines to serve all six continents, and thanks to our customers’ response to our offerings, we are also the world’s fastest-growing airline. We connect more than 140 destinations on the map every day, with a fleet of the latest-generation aircraft, and an unrivalled level of service from our home and hub, the Five-star airport, Hamad International Airport in Doha, the State of Qatar.

item.title: Hey Developers, Join Europe's largest tech-focused job platform!
item.summary:
Choose your preferred tech stack and receive job offers from leading tech companies in Germany and the Netherlands!
IT, honeypot, information technology, developer
item.content: <description><p><span style="font-weight:400;">Honeypot supports Software Developers, DevOps Engineers and Engineering Leaders as well as Data Scientists, Data Engineers and Machine Learning Engineers. </span></p><p><span style="font-weight:400;">Companies can search for developers based on skills and specialisations — the qualifications and requirements of each company may differ depending on their tech needs. </span></p><p> </p><p>Creating a profile is quick and easy, it takes less than five minutes to share your skills, experience and work preferences. And after that, your profile will be available to hundreds of companies located in Germany, the Netherlands, Switzerland and Austria.</p><p>You’ll also have access to dedicated career advisors who can offer personalised profile and interview support so you can focus on choosing a great job.</p></description>
item.qualifications: <p>On Honeypot, currently, there is an increasingly high demand for Backend and Frontend Developer roles for companies hiring on Honeypot.</p>
item.name: Honeypot GmbH
item.description: Honeypot is a reverse-recruiting developer focused job platform, meaning companies apply to you not the other way around. Your profile will indicate your ideal location, salary and tech stack so companies can send tailored interview invitations. Top developers on the platform usually receive multiple interview invitations meaning they can compare offers side-by-side for a better job search experience.

item.title: Male Travelling Personal Assistant
item.summary: Male Travelling Personal assistant for private family that has global corporate and personal activities based in Switzerland / France / Schengen States
item.content: <description><p>Language requirements: English (proficient).</p><p>Conversational French will be a major advantage.</p><p>Driving License (international): Yes</p><p>We are looking for a versatile, professional, honest and dedicated individual with preferably over 5 years’ experience for a private HNW family based in EU. The ideal candidate for this position would be from hospitality industry and/or worked as a PA for HNW families.</p><p><strong><u>Skills and attributes</u></strong></p><ul><li>Management of international property portfolios</li><li>Extensive staff management</li><li>Financial management</li><li>Event management</li><li>Lifestyle management</li></ul><p><strong>Duties will include but not be limited to:</strong></p><ul><li>Multiple diary management</li><li>Book travel and holidays</li><li>Liaise with schools, business partners or other organizations</li><li>Personal and household shopping</li><li>Meet and greet guests</li><li>Pet sit when required</li><li>Make bookings and reservations</li><li>Manage the household staff</li><li>HR duties for the household staff</li><li>Organize cooperate or personal events</li><li>Grocery shopping either in person or online</li><li>Organize contractors</li><li>Manage multiple properties around the globe- can include helping with refurbishment, silver polishing and more.</li><li>Accompany the family when they travel</li><li>Manage staff and salary accounting.</li></ul><p> </p></description>
item.name: Bing Enterprises

item.title: Représentant(e) au développement des ventes
item.summary: Ta principale responsabilité est d’inspirer les entrepreneurs à numériser leur flux de travail par l’entremise de Lightspeed.
item.content: <description><p><strong>Bonjour ! Merci de ta visite </strong><br/> Es-tu activement à la recherche d’une nouvelle opportunité ? Ou tu ne fais que jeter un coup d’œil au marché ? Eh bien… tu te trouves au bon endroit !<br/><br/> Lightspeed compte sur des équipes partout dans le monde et offre une plateforme de commerce unique aux commerçants des secteurs de l’hôtellerie, du commerce électronique et du commerce de détail. Lightspeed est une entreprise de commerce de premier plan qui a connu une période de forte croissance, comptant aujourd’hui plus de 2 500 employés dans plus de 14 pays.<br/><br/> Nous sommes à la recherche d’un(e) représentant(e) au développement des ventes dynamique qui se joindra à nos équipes des ventes hautement performantes et motivées en Europe. L’objectif de notre plateforme tout-en-un est d’aider les entrepreneurs à travailler plus intelligemment. En tant que représentant(e) au développement des ventes, tu es la clé pour atteindre cet objectif. Tout en déterminant les clients potentiels et en effectuant un suivi auprès d’eux, tu bâtiras un réseau solide avec les entrepreneurs en commerce électronique, en commerce de détail et en hôtellerie.<br/><br/><strong>Tes responsabilités :</strong><br/> Ta principale responsabilité est d’inspirer les entrepreneurs à numériser leur flux de travail par l’entremise de Lightspeed et, à titre de conseiller(ère) de confiance, de faire le point sur leurs besoins et de déterminer si les solutions de Lightspeed y répondent.</p><ul><li>En premier lieu, tu qualifieras les contacts, par téléphone et par courriel, provenant des canaux de marketing (webinaires, essais, demandes de devis et de démonstration).</li><li>Une fois que tu auras déterminé que le contact est admissible, tu organiseras une démonstration avec nos responsables de compte. En collaboration avec le ou la responsable de compte, tu aideras les entrepreneurs à travailler plus intelligemment et de la façon la plus efficace.<img style="height:0;width:0;" src="https://t.ltpx.nl/track.php?orderid=363829" alt=""/></li></ul></description>
item.name: Lightspeed
item.description:
Notre plateforme de commerce unique transforme et unifie les opérations numériques et physiques en permettant les ventes multicanaux, l'expansion vers de nouveaux sites, les paiements mondiaux, les solutions financières et la connexion aux réseaux de fournisseurs. Grâce à la plateforme de commerce Lightspeed, les commerçants du secteur de la vente au détail et de l'hôtellerie peuvent créer des entreprises prospères pour l'avenir.
Lightspeed, dont le siège social se trouve à Montréal, bénéficie de la confiance des entreprises locales favorites, où la communauté va faire ses achats et déguster sa gastronomie. Lightspeed possède des bureaux au Canada, aux États-Unis, en Europe, en Russie et dans la région APAC.

item.title: Sozialpädagogische/Psychologische Fachkräfte (m/w/d) für unsere neue stationäre
item.summary: Sozialpädagogische/Psychologische Fachkräfte (m/w/d) für unsere neue stationäre Wohngruppe in Hofheim am Taunus gesuchtDie Impuls GmbH, Institut für Erziehungshilfen und Therapien ist ein Spin off für den Bereich stationäre sowie teilstationäre Jugendhilfe des 2006 gegründeten Jugendhilfeträgers "LernportaL Rüsselsheim". Das Institut verfügt über 10 Einrichtungen und 100 Mitarbeitern verteilt im Kern des Rhein-Main-Gebietes. Unser Verwaltungssitz ist in Rüsselsheim am Main. Für unsere neue therapeutische Wohngruppe in Hofheim am Taunus suchen wir
item.content: <description><p><strong>Ihre Aufgaben</strong></p><ul><li>Das Führen von Gruppengespräche und Einzelgespräche</li><li>Gestaltung und Organisationen des Alltags der Jugendlichen</li><li>Organisation von Freizeit und Terminen (Behörden. Arzt usw.)</li><li>Dokumentation und Berichtswesen</li><li>Psychosoziale Beratung von Klienten</li><li>Mitwirkung bei den Hilfeplangesprächen mit den zuständigen Jugendämtern</li><li>Keine Nachtdienste<br/><br/><strong>Was wir uns wünschen<br/><br/></strong></li><li>Studium der (Sozial-) Pädagogik, Soziale Arbeit oder Psychologie oder</li><li>Erzieherausbildung</li><li>Grundkenntnisse der Gesprächsführung</li><li>Kreativität, Teamfähigkeit, Belastbarkeit, Empathie, Humor</li><li>Einfühlvermögen</li><li>Wertschätzender und klarer Umgang mit den BewohnerInnen </li><li>Bereitschaft zum Schichtdienst (Früh und Spätschicht bis 21:00 Uhr)</li><li>PKW-Führerschein<br/><br/><strong>Wir bieten</strong>· <br/> </li><li>Gute Arbeitsatmosphäre</li><li>Gute Bezahlung in Anlehnung an TVöD</li><li>Einzel-, Team- und Fallsupervision</li><li>Interne und externe Fortbildungen</li><li>Betriebliche Altersvorsorge</li><li>Aufstiegsmöglichkeiten</li></ul></description>
item.name: Impuls GmbH Institut für Erziehungshilfe und Therapie
item.description: Die Impuls GmbH – Institut für Erziehungshilfe und Therapie verpflichtet sich in seinem Leitbild dem humanistischen Menschenbild, ausgerichtet an freiheitlich-demokratischen Werten.

item.title: Secret Shopper in Berlin
item.summary: Luxury brands are looking for your customer feedback to improve their customer experience, in store and online !
item.content: <description><p>“<em>Imagine getting paid to grace the stores of the world's top luxury and premium brands...!</em></p><p><em>Luxury brands are looking for your customer feedback to improve their customer experience, in store and online !</em></p><p><em>If you enjoy shopping and are looking for an occasional hobby and to make some extra money, during lunch break or after work, this may be the opportunity for you.</em></p><p><em>This is the opportunity CXG currently has available for expert male and female shoppers in <strong>Berlin</strong>. Simply visit a boutique (and/or browse the brand's website), share your insights in a survey and get rewarded.</em></p><p><em>To join our community, register through the link below and we will be in touch.</em></p><p><a href="https://www.albatrossonline.com"><em>https://www.albatrossonline.com</em></a></p><p>“<em>Stellen Sie sich vor, Sie werden dafür bezahlt, die Geschäfte der besten Luxus- und Premiummarken der Welt zu schmücken ...!</em></p><p><em>Luxusmarken suchen nach Ihrem Kundenfeedback, um ihr Kundenerlebnis im Geschäft und online zu verbessern!</em></p><p><em>Wenn Sie gerne einkaufen und auf der Suche nach einem gelegentlichen Hobby sind und etwas mehr Geld verdienen möchten, in der Mittagspause oder nach der Arbeit, kann dies die Gelegenheit für Sie sein.</em></p><p><em>Dies ist die Möglichkeit, die CXG derzeit für erfahrene männliche und weibliche Käufer in <strong>Berlin</strong> bietet. Besuchen Sie einfach eine Boutique (und/ oder durchsuchen Sie die Website der Marke), teilen Sie Ihre Erkenntnisse in einer Umfrage und lassen Sie sich belohnen.</em></p><p><em>Um unserer Community beizutreten, registrieren Sie sich über den untenstehenden Link und wir werden uns mit Ihnen in Verbindung setzen.</em></p><p> </p><p> </p><p><a href="https://www.albatrossonline.com"><em>https://www.albatrossonline.com</em></a></p></description>
item.name: CXG
item.description: CXG offers a powerful, holistic platform that enables premium and luxury brands to transform their experiences for meaningful impact. We believe in partnering with our clients at every and any stage of their CX transformation journey, while providing consulting and actionable advice along the way.

item.title: German Customer Advisor for Signify – Extra Bonus
item.summary: Our brand is the world leader in lighting for professionals, consumers, and lighting for the Internet of Things.
item.content: <description><p><strong>About Webhelp</strong></p><p><strong>Webhelp</strong> is a French multinational BPO company that is making business more human for the world’s most exciting brands. By <strong>choosing Webhelp</strong> you will be part of a family of over 95,000 game-changers from more than 190 locations in 51 countries.</p><p> Join us at <strong>Webhelp Portugal</strong> and you will have the opportunity to be part of a multicultural team, a fast-paced environment, and a diverse pool of engaging projects with some of the best B2C and B2B brands worldwide.</p><p> </p><p><strong>About the job role: </strong></p><p>Our brand is the world leader in lighting for professionals, consumers, and lighting for the Internet of Things.</p><p>As a <strong>Customer Support Advisor</strong>, you will:</p><ul><li>Answer and/or solve technical questions or problems posed by customers via telephone or email or other channels in a friendly and efficient manner.</li><li>Identify and analyze the technical issue of the customer by showing active listening and asking clear and concise questions.</li><li>Provide good customer service with the aid of high-quality technical knowledge and the technical knowledge gained from the internal training and support systems.</li><li>Per each customer contact gather and document all relevant information into the system to ensure a high level of service is delivered.</li><li>Keep up to date with all new developments in the technical area, networks and consumer electronics relating to the position.</li></ul><p><strong> </strong></p><p><strong>We are looking for:</strong></p><ul><li>Native or Proficient <strong>German (C2)</strong></li><li>Fluency in <strong>English (B2)</strong></li><li>Possess excellent writing and verbal communication skills to simplify technical language for non-technical users</li><li>Demonstrate patience when communicating and solving issues</li><li>Treat all data and personal information with the utmost confidentiality</li><li>Proactive, self-motivated and a great team player.</li></ul><p><strong> </strong></p><p><strong>We offer you:</strong></p><ul><li>Competitive wages (14 monthly payments per year)</li><li>Meal allowance in voucher card (net)</li><li>Monthly Performance Bonus</li><li>Extra Bonus</li><li>Private Health insurance with a dental plan</li><li><strong>Relocation package - shared accommodation and flight reimbursement</strong></li></ul><p> </p><p><strong> </strong><strong>Life at our company: </strong></p><ul><li>Work with a diverse environment with people from over 58 nationalities</li><li>Benefit from our modern amenities, many discounts in local businesses, company parties and events and much more!</li><li>We promote inter-company mobility to work at any of our sites around the world</li><li>New and modern offices in <strong>Parque das Nações, Oriente, Lisbon.</strong></li></ul><p> </p><p> </p><p>All submissions will be treated confidentially under the General Data Protection Regulation.</p><p><strong>Webhelp Portugal</strong> is an equal opportunity employer.</p><p>Webhelp considers diversity as a fundamental resource and it offers everyone access to employment opportunities, regardless of their gender, age, religion, ethnicity, or any other classification protected by applicable national laws.</p></description>
item.name: Webhelp Portugal
item.description: Webhelp is a French multinational BPO company that is making business more human for the world’s most exciting brands. By choosing Webhelp you will be part of a family of over 62,000 game-changers from more than 170 locations in 49 countries. Join us at Webhelp Portugal and you will have the opportunity to be part of a multicultural team, a fast-paced environment, and a diverse pool of engaging projects with some of the best B2C and B2B brands worldwide.

item.title: IT Systems Engineer
item.summary: The successful candidate will become the second member of the internal IT team to help configure, maintain and enhance IT system services and tools to best support the growing user base. The candidate will work with various departments and developers to enhance IT solutions for better scalability and efficiency. Work requires swift response in troubleshooting end-user issues, setting up computers and user accounts, proactively monitoring servers, and taking appropriate action to prevent service interruptions.
item.content: <description/>
item.name: Verity AG
item.description:
Verity is the global leader in autonomous indoor drone systems and a leading provider of drone failsafe technology. Founded in 2014, Verity's drones have completed more than 250,000 autonomous flights safely above people, in more than 100 facilities in 20 countries worldwide.
In the logistics and warehousing industries, Verity’s solutions automate inventory management, monitoring, and inspection tasks, providing clients such as IKEA and DSV actionable insights into their daily operations. In the live events industries, Verity’s systems create magical moments for audiences around the globe, providing stunning light shows for clients including Cirque du Soleil and Madison Square Garden, and for global tours of major artists including Metallica, Drake, and Céline Dion.
We continuously reach beyond existing limitations to rethink, reimagine, and rework the role of robotics in the world today. Come help us break new boundaries for drone systems and technologies!. The Verity team is made up of people from all walks of life. With over 20 nationalities in a team of around 70 people, we are entrepreneurs, engineers, artists, business professionals, computer scientists, and designers working together as one.
Are you ready for a great adventure? Learn more about who we are, what we do, and how we think at www.verity.ch/careers

item.title: Installation Project Manager
item.summary: As Verity’s industrial drones are being rolled out to warehouses worldwide and production volumes rise, we are seeking to grow our deployment team with a Technical Project Manager. The successful candidate will lead the planning and installation of our systems at customer sites and will assist in improving our processes so that we can deploy systems better each time. This position will require frequent travel to customers’ sites.

item.title: Analyste de donnée en ligne
item.summary:
Nous aidons des entreprises à tester et à améliorer des modèles d’apprentissage d’appareils via notre Communauté globale d’IA de plus d’un million d’annotateurs et de linguistes. Notre propre plate-forme d’apprentissage d’IA gère tout type de données (texte, images, audio, vidéo et géographique) pour plus de 500 langues et dialectes. Notre solution de données IA améliore grandement les systèmes d’IA pour une large gamme d’applications, pour que les produits intelligents avancés obtiennent de meilleurs résultats de recherche, ou pour améliorer la reconnaissance vocale. Nous travaillons aussi pour obtenir de meilleures interactions homme-machine et bien plus encore.
Pour en savoir plus, suivez ce lien http://www.telusinternational.com
item.content: <description><p><strong>Opportunité disponible :</strong></p><p>Cette opportunité vous permettra de travailler depuis votre domicile en tant que travailleur(se) indépendant(e) avec un emploi du temps flexible, jusqu’à 20 heures par semaine à effectuer des tâches grâce à un outil d’évaluation en ligne. La tâche impliquera de déterminer la pertinence et la précision de l’information en effectuant des recherches en ligne et en se référant à des instructions que nous vous fournirons. Vous effectuerez des tâches d’évaluations pour valider des données. Vous apporterez une contribution à l’authentification de données qui serviront pour des recherches concrètes qui seront utilisées par des millions d’utilisateurs à travers le monde.</p><p> </p><p><strong>Candidat(e) idéal(e) : </strong></p><p>Les candidat(e)s pour cette opportunité doivent avoir de bonnes aptitudes à la recherche et une excellente compréhension des informations locales et nationales. Des connaissances culturelles, géographiques et sur les médias sociaux sont importantes pour ce travail.</p></description>
item.name: TELUS International AI Inc.
item.description: We help companies test and improve machine learning models via our global AI Community of 1 million+ annotators and linguists. Our proprietary AI training platform handles all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. Our AI Data Solutions vastly enhance AI systems across a range of applications from advanced smart products, to better search results, to expanded speech recognition, to more human-like bot interactions and so much more. Learn more at http://www.telusinternational.com

item.title: Front-end Engineer
item.summary: Our Lisbon office is looking for a Senior Front-end Engineer to solve juicy digital challenges at scale, share expertise with others, and work closely with Reaktor communities in Amsterdam, Stockholm, Helsinki, NYC and Tokyo.
item.content: <description><h2><strong>About Reaktor</strong></h2><p>Working in teams and helping clients is our bread and butter. Reaktor’s cross functional teams consist of Front-end Engineers, Backend / DevOps &amp; SRE specialists, Designers, Data Scientists, and Coaches. We unite our efforts to help future-thinking companies like <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/work/adidas-outdoor/">adidas</a>, <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/work/lego/">Lego</a>, <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/blog/ww-wins-big-at-the-emmys/">HBO</a>, <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/work/finavia/">Finavia</a>, and <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/blog/reaktor-works-with-liverpool-fc-on-a-new-digital-experience-for-fan-engagement/">FC Liverpool</a> succeed in their world-scale digital endeavours everyday.</p><h2><strong>About the job</strong></h2><p>Our <a href="http://reaktor.com/lisbon">Lisbon office</a> is looking for a Senior Front-end Engineer to solve juicy digital challenges at scale, share expertise with others, and work closely with Reaktor communities in Amsterdam, Stockholm, Helsinki, NYC and Tokyo. We enjoy working on-site and spending time with our team, but want to offer you opportunity for remote work whenever you wish, support your home office set-up and provide a remote-friendly working environment. </p><h4><strong>As a Senior Front-end Engineer you:</strong></h4><ul><li>Write complex software from scratch with functional JavaScript/TypeScript utilizing the latest libraries</li><li>Take care of both the technical and human side of projects</li><li>Are familiar with React / Vue, automated testing &amp; deployment</li><li>Dabble outside of the browser every now and then (e.g. setup simple CI pipelines)</li><li>Scribble a small humble piece of HTML sprinkled with JavaScript hosted on Netlify when it’s the simplest thing that gets the job done</li></ul><p><strong>Salary</strong>: 42000 - 60000 euro a year</p><h2><strong>Benefits</strong></h2><p>We offer everything you’d expect of an international tech company: interesting projects, competitive salary and an opportunity to go on work stays to Reaktor offices around the globe. But what really makes us different is our Nordic culture — expect great attention to the work-life balance with a possibility to work flexible hours; high levels of trust and autonomy; and a friendly team of interesting personalities willing to connect beyond work.</p><h4><strong>Here are our benefits in detail:</strong></h4><ul><li>Flexible working hours</li><li>Work trips between EU offices</li><li>Team activities and get-togethers</li><li>Compensation of self-development activities (courses, conferences, certifications, etc.)</li><li>Get paid to do Open Source work</li><li>Company shares</li><li>The latest computer and phone of your choice</li><li>Extended health insurance </li><li>Screens, keyboard, headphones</li><li>An ergonomic home office if needed</li><li>Healthy and not-so-healthy snacks and drinks at the office</li><li>Travel expenses </li><li>Phone subscription</li><li>Home internet expenses coverage</li><li>Company trips twice a year (when the pandemic situation permits)</li></ul></description>
item.name: Reaktor
item.description:
A company where developers solve human problems with first-class technologies.
Reaktor is a consultancy helping international clients (adidas, Lego, HBO, Finavia, FC Liverpool, and others) succeed in technology. Our Nordic culture defines the key principle of Reaktor: offering exceptional technological competence while deeply caring about the wellbeing of our team-mates.
For more than 20 years, Reaktor has been shaping the digital landscape from our HQ in Helsinki and global offices in Amsterdam, Stockholm, New York and Tokyo. And we don’t want to stop there

item.title: Inside Sales Specialist
item.summary:
Fornova is a world leader in market intelligence solutions for the online travel and hospitality industries. Amongst our customers we are proud to name the leading Online Travel Agencies like Booking.com, Expedia, etc as well as the leading hotel chains like Marriott, Hilton, Hyatt and Accor.
Our patented technology gathers data at scale; every year we deliver over 100 million room-nights, 7 billion shops and over 35 billion price comparisons, but we are not stopping there.
We are committed to help our customers maximize their revenue potential by providing them with a unified view of all their business intelligence, along with actionable insights that lead to performance improvements, so our vision is something even greater: we want to become the leading hospitality BI solution provider in the industry.
Founded in 2010, Fornova now has about 150 employees globally.
item.content: <description><p>We’re seeking a talented Inside Sales Specialist to join our team. The role reports into the VP Sales. </p><p>The Account Executive will focus on selling to hotel chains.</p><p>· Source potential client opportunities via cold calling, (cold) emailing campaigns and through interaction with professional industry network groups</p><p>· Build, organize and execute a business development plan to achieve business aims and sales targets.</p><p>· Utilize and develop innovative strategies to maximize results and win over challenging targets.</p><p>· Respond to all incoming product inquiries, referrals and leads in a timely and effective manner.</p><p>· Preparation of accurate quotes, development and presentation of proposals to clients in a professional and confident manner.</p><p>· Maintain accurate records of your business development activities</p><p>· Provide client feedback on products to the Product Development team so that products can be reviewed in line with the feedback.</p><p>· Attend meetings, (inter)national conferences and organize regional road shows as required</p><p>· Achieve sales targets.</p></description>
item.name: Fornova
item.description:
Our vision: Empower the global travel & hospitality industry to optimize distribution, generate demand and maximize revenue. We enable our clients' entire organization (from revenue and distribution to sales, e-Commerce and operations) to make better decisions faster, navigate through changing market environments and stay ahead of the competition.
Technology is deep in our DNA, and we love using it to solve complex problems. We brought together some of the finest researchers, engineers and data scientists in the world and we have already cracked the challenge of gathering large volumes of travel and hotel distribution data - so now we are focused on developing machine intelligence to better analyse that data, drive effective decisions and maximize revenue and profit

item.title: Software Engineer
item.summary: Our Lisbon office is looking for a Software Engineer who will become the cornerstone of our new global technology hub.
item.content: <description><p>At Reaktor, we help future-thinking companies (<a href="https://www.reaktor.com/work/adidas-outdoor/">adidas</a>, <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/work/lego/">Lego</a>, <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/blog/ww-wins-big-at-the-emmys/">HBO</a>, <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/work/finavia/">Finavia</a>, <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/blog/reaktor-works-with-liverpool-fc-on-a-new-digital-experience-for-fan-engagement/">FC Liverpool</a>, and <a href="https://www.reaktor.com/work/">others</a>) succeed in technology. Our Nordic culture defines our key principle: offering exceptional technological competence while deeply caring about the wellbeing of our team-mates. We are known for our human approach, have a <a href="https://www.glassdoor.nl/Location/Reaktor-Amsterdam-Location-EI_IE589428.0,7_IL.8,17_IC3064478.htm">5-star Glassdoor rating</a>, and <a href="https://reaktorspace.com/reaktor-hello-world/">launched a satellite</a> running Node.js in low Earth orbit.</p><p>Our <a href="http://reaktor.com/lisbon">Lisbon office</a> is looking for a <strong>Senior Software Engineer</strong> who will become the cornerstone of our new global technology hub of the brightest minds. When you are a Reaktorian, you will be solving juicy digital challenges, sharing expertise, working closely with Reaktor communities in Amsterdam, Stockholm, Helsinki, and connecting with colleagues and clients from all over the world. </p><h2><strong>What about tech?</strong><strong><br/></strong></h2><p>We know that good developers can create great things in any language. For that reason, we see ourselves as technology agnostic and don’t have specific tech requirements. Things we get excited about include: functional programming, Clojure, TypeScript, React, Swift, Kotlin, Postgres and Kanban. We would love to hear about your favourite technologies and see your interest in trying out the others as well.</p><h2><strong>What’s in it for you?</strong></h2><p>We offer everything you’d expect of an international tech company: interesting projects, competitive salary and an opportunity to go on work stays to Reaktor offices around the globe. But what really makes us different is our Nordic culture — expect great attention to the work-life balance with a possibility to work flexible hours; high levels of trust and autonomy; and a friendly team of interesting personalities willing to connect beyond work.</p><p>We believe you know best what helps you grow – be it a certification program, taking a training, participating in a conference or joining one of the numerous Reaktor Communities of Practice – and we are always there to fully support you in your development journey. </p><p><strong>Salary</strong>: 42000 - 60000 euro a year.</p><h2><strong>Let’s talk about benefits</strong></h2><ul><li>The latest computer and phone of your choice</li><li>Screens, keyboard, headphones</li><li>An ergonomic home office if needed</li><li>Flexible working hours</li><li>Extended health insurance </li><li>Compensation of any development activities (courses, conferences, certifications, etc.)</li><li>Healthy and not-so-healthy snacks and drinks at the office</li><li>Team activities and get-togethers</li><li>Travel expenses </li><li>Work trips between EU offices</li><li>Phone subscription</li><li>Home internet expenses coverage</li><li>Company trips twice a year (when the pandemic situation permits)</li><li>Company shares</li></ul></description>

item.title: Software Developers, DevOps Engineers, Engineering Leaders, Data Scientists, Data Engineers and Machine Learning Needed!
item.summary:
Choose your preferred tech stack and receive job offers from leading tech companies in Germany
IT, honeypot, information technology, developer
item.content: <description><p><span style="font-weight:400;">Honeypot supports Software Developers, DevOps Engineers and Engineering Leaders as well as Data Scientists, Data Engineers and Machine Learning Engineers. </span></p><p><span style="font-weight:400;">Companies can search for developers based on skills and specialisations — the qualifications and requirements of each company may differ depending on their tech needs. </span></p><p> </p><p>Creating a profile is quick and easy, it takes less than five minutes to share your skills, experience and work preferences. And after that, your profile will be available to hundreds of companies located in Germany, the Netherlands, Switzerland and Austria.</p><p>You’ll also have access to dedicated career advisors who can offer personalised profile and interview support so you can focus on choosing a great job.</p></description>
item.qualifications: <p>On Honeypot, currently, there is an increasingly high demand for Backend and Frontend Developer roles for companies hiring on Honeypot.</p>
item.name: Honeypot GmbH
item.description: Honeypot is a reverse-recruiting developer focused job platform, meaning companies apply to you not the other way around. Your profile will indicate your ideal location, salary and tech stack so companies can send tailored interview invitations. Top developers on the platform usually receive multiple interview invitations meaning they can compare offers side-by-side for a better job search experience.

item.title: Course Administrator

item.title: React Native developer

The company has three different international software development teams with different focus area's. At the moment we are looking for a developer that want to help the App development team.
